long_description: The women's Sugoi Firewall 260 jacket offers weather-resistant, moisture-wicking performance that's designed to keep you comfortable during cold-weather training. Polyester shell fabric features a breathable polyurethane laminate to fend off light rain, wind and snow and a brushed interior that provides next-to-skin warmth. Ample stretch allows free range of motion; spandex in the back adds additional stretch for comfort in the riding position, plus shape retention and wrinkle resistance. Plush collar and soft draft flap guard against cold wind and zipper abrasion. Dual adjustable shockcord can be accessed from twin front pockets. Reflective elements on sleeves, pocket zippers and front zipper boost your visibility to motorists. Slim athletic cut fits close to the body. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi Firewall 260 jacket offers weather-resistant, moisture-wicking performance that's designed to keep you comfortable during cold-weather training.
